授業目的: This course aims to study widely and deeply about the dynamism of cultures in the history and in our time. While the term ‘culture’ is used so frequently and without doubt in our society as well as in our daily conversations, how many of us really have a clear understanding of what it really means? Through this course we will, therefore, look together at various aspects of culture such as its political quality, its flexibility and spontaneity, and enduring and volatile natures, in order to pave the way for more critical examination and discussion about culture.
到達目標:
Upon successfully completing the course, you should be able to:
- Demonstrate a concrete understanding of various aspects of culture;
- Understand its diversity as well as contingency, without uncritically accepting the idea;
- Demonstrate an ability to make a positive contribution to the class even in this difficult situation;
- With a degree of confidence, begin to critically engage with source materials in order to accurately grasp and summarize key themes/topics in comments, assignments, presentation and/or the final essay.

授業方法:
Lecture, discussion and assignments
- Each session consists of a lecture and discussion;
- Students will write a feedback/comment and share it with others through the online portal;
- Students will make a group presentation based on their research on one of topics from the course;
- Students will write an academic essay at the end of the semester based on their individual/group research
